openstack_compute_flavor_v2.description: Manages a V2 flavor resource within OpenStack.

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 Compute client.

name.description: A unique name for the flavor. Changing this creates a new

ram.description: The amount of RAM to use, in megabytes. Changing this

vcpus.description: The number of virtual CPUs to use. Changing this creates

disk.description: The amount of disk space in gigabytes to use for the root

swap.description: The amount of disk space in megabytes to use. If

rx_tx_factor.description: RX/TX bandwith factor. The default is 1. Changing

is_public.description: Whether the flavor is public. Changing this creates

extra_specs.description: Key/Value pairs of metadata for the flavor.
